biotools.summary:
A New Approach for Virtual Ligand Screening of Proteins and Virtual Target Screening of Biomolecules.

Center for the Study of Systems Biology.

FINDSITEcomb2.0: A Drug Discovery Tool is an upgrade of the FINDSITEcomb algorithm that was compared to several commercially and freely available docking programs against the DUD set A Directory of Useful Decoys.

bioschemas.name: FINDSITEsupcomb2.0
